name: Fate/stay night [Realta Nua]
summary: The complicated threads in Fate Stay Night unravels in Realta Nua. The series tells some of the most bloody and brutal love stories ever. The three heroines, Saber, Rin and Sakura each has a tale to tell, and depending on which path Emiya Shirou takes, he can either become the saviour who ends the Holy Grail wars for good or become another heroic spirit bound to be called out when the flames of war start again.
